tags.scope: Build, release, and repository maintenance scripts
tags.comment: For aspects about node scripts we use automation, versions, telemetry and sandbox utilities.

tags.scope: Building, packaging and publishing Qwen Code
tags.comment: We use scripts/build.js, build_sandbox.js, Dockerfile and other build pipelines for aspects.

tags.scope: Dialogue engine and interaction with models
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that describe the orchestration of chat sessions and content generators.

tags.scope: Recording, serializing and exporting chat history
tags.comment: We bet on aspects about saving conversations, exporting tokens and associated files in ~/.gemini/tmp.

tags.scope: CLI commands (slash commands, auxiliary dialogs, handlers).
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that describe slash commands, the command framework and related interactions in the terminal UI.

tags.scope: CLI Configuration Layers and Settings Management
tags.comment: For aspects about downloading and migration, we use settings, trusted folders, an extension directory and auxiliary configuration utilities.

tags.scope: The main thread for launching the Qwen Code CLI
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that deal with initialization, restarts, and processing of CLI flags.

tags.scope: Terminal UI and Ink CLI components
tags.comment: We use TUI dialogs, hooks and visual elements for aspects that describe App.tsx.

tags.scope: Integration with Code Assist server and IDE proxy
tags.comment: We use server, OAuth and IDE connectors for the code-assist aspects.

tags.scope: History, memory and context compression management
tags.comment: We focus on aspects about storing history, compression, including the IDE/directory in the tooltip.

tags.scope: Central configuration and registration of kernel services
tags.comment: Used for aspects that describe the Config class and associated extension points.

tags.scope: Basic kernel parameters and common constants for content generators
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that describe core constants, timeout policies, and configuration that affects the operation of content generators and services.

tags.scope: Qwen Code core services providing infrastructure functions
tags.comment: We mark aspects about ShellExecutionService, GitService, FileDiscovery and other services from packages/core/src/services.

tags.scope: Declarative tools implemented in packages/core/src/tools
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that describe specific tools (shell, read-file, web-search, etc.) and the ToolRegistry infrastructure.

tags.scope: Core utilities that provide support services and security
tags.comment: We mark common core helpers: retry, error handling, file search and tokenizers.

tags.scope: Documentation and manuals supported by current workflows
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that summarize official instructions on architecture, sandbox, telemetry, checkpointing and repository automation.

tags.scope: File read and write operations in the kernel
tags.comment: We use for aspects about standard implementations of FileSystemService, write/read tools, etc.

tags.scope: Project scanning and path filtering
tags.comment: We use it for aspects about FileDiscoveryService, ignoring and file system bypass.

tags.scope: Git integration and checkpoint management
tags.comment: We use for aspects about GitService, shadow repository and commit logging.

tags.scope: Integration of IDE components (VSCode companion, MCP server, IDE context)
tags.comment: We use it for aspects that describe IDE plugins and their interaction with the Qwen Code core/CLI.

tags.scope: Integration scenarios and Terminal Bench
tags.comment: We use it to describe integration tests, Terminal Bench configurations and auxiliary scripts.

tags.scope: ESLint, Prettier and other static quality checks
tags.comment: For aspects about eslint.config.js, custom rules and npm lint scripts are used.

tags.scope: Detect response loops and tool repetitions
tags.comment: We add aspects that describe LoopDetectionService and related telemetry events.

tags.scope: Specifics of launch and restrictions on macOS
tags.comment: We mark aspects that describe seatbelt profiles, permissions and other nuances of the macOS environment.

tags.scope: Model Context Protocol integration and MCP client management
tags.comment: We note aspects about MCP tools, storing OAuth tokens and calling remote MCP services.

tags.scope: Long-term memory and fact management
tags.comment: We use the commands about /memory, discovery and memory import for aspects.

tags.scope: Catalog of metrics and events for analytics
tags.comment: We use telemetry/metrics.ts, tool-call-decision and other counters for aspects.

tags.scope: Integration with OpenAI and compatible providers
tags.comment: We focus on aspects about the OpenAI content generator, providers and adapters.

tags.scope: Preparing artifacts and metadata for npm publishing
tags.comment: We add aspects about prepare-package and copying licenses/README into packages.

tags.scope: Privacy Policies and Managing User Data Collection Options
tags.comment: We use it for aspects about privacy notice, opt-in flows and telemetry switches in the CLI.

tags.scope: System and user prompts, instructions for models
tags.comment: For aspects about the formation, we use system prompt, user instructions and logic for preparing the context before sending it to the model.

tags.scope: Qwen authorization flow and OAuth token management
tags.comment: We note aspects about Qwen OAuth2, storing/updating tokens and integration with Qwen providers.

tags.scope: Running in sandbox containers and environment restrictions
tags.comment: We mark the aspects that control the transition to the sandbox and the configuration of containers.

tags.scope: Workspace full-text search tools and services
tags.comment: We focus on aspects about ripGrep, glob and other search operations.

tags.scope: Security, OAuth and Access Control
tags.comment: We use it for aspects about storing tokens, sandboxing and checking rights.

tags.scope: Working with shell commands and the terminal
tags.comment: We use for aspects about ShellExecutionService, shell tool and pty management.

tags.scope: Managing subagents, their configuration and events
tags.comment: We focus on aspects about the Task tool, SubagentManager and subagent telemetry.

tags.scope: Collecting, buffering and sending telemetry
tags.comment: We use for aspects about SDK, loggers and telemetry exporters.

tags.scope: Integration and load test infrastructure
tags.comment: We use Vitest configuration, global setup and terminal benchmarks for aspects.

tags.scope: CLI themes and semantic palettes
tags.comment: For aspects we use the Theme class, built-in palettes and semantic colors that affect Ink/Markdown design.

tags.scope: HTTP and external web API calls
tags.comment: We use web-fetch, web-search and other network tools for aspects.
